value: Adventure Bay lookout, gentle morning breeze, distant seagulls

speaker: NARRATOR
text: [warm] The morning sun shimmered over Adventure Bay, making the water sparkle like a thousand tiny diamonds. Up at the Lookout, Ryder stood on the platform with his binoculars while the pups gathered around, tails wagging.

speaker: RYDER
text: [confident] Alright, PAW Patrol! It’s a beautiful day—and that usually means a new adventure is right around the corner.

speaker: SKYE
text: [cheerful] The skies are clear and perfect for flying!

speaker: ROCKY
text: [proud] Reuse it or fix it—either way, I’m in.

speaker: EVEREST
text: [confident] Snow problem too big, snow pup too small!

speaker: RYDER
text: [serious] Uh-oh. We’ve got a call—from the icy cove near Seal Island. There’s a lost baby penguin drifting on a small ice floe, and her parents can’t find her.

speaker: RYDER
text: [commanding] PAW Patrol, to the Arctic Rescue!

value: Arctic cove ambience, wind whoosh, distant waves against ice
vehicle engines, hovercraft hum, snowplow crunch

speaker: NARRATOR
text: [adventurous] The pups raced toward the icy shore. Zuma’s hovercraft led across the water, while Everest’s snowplow carved a safe path over the ice. Skye flew overhead, scanning the horizon.

speaker: SKYE
text: [alert] There! I see a tiny penguin on a floating ice chunk!

speaker: ZUMA
text: [calm] Easy does it… we don’t want to scare her.

speaker: NARRATOR
text: [curious] As they got closer, they noticed something surprising. On a nearby ice ledge stood another pup—one they had never seen before.

speaker: RYDER
text: [welcoming] Hi there! I’m Ryder. Who are you?

speaker: POUYA
text: [encouraging] Great! And hastam means “am.” So: Man hastam—“I am.”

speaker: NARRATOR
text: [gentle] The baby penguin chirped softly, as if she liked the sound.

speaker: RYDER
text: [smiling] Looks like we’ve made a new friend—and learned a new word!

speaker: POUYA
text: [gentle] That means the little penguin is lost.

speaker: RUBBLE
text: [urgent] We need to get her somewhere warm and safe.

speaker: ZUMA
text: [focused] I can scoop her up gently.

speaker: MARSHALL
text: [alarmed] Oh no! That ice won’t hold much longer!

speaker: NARRATOR
text: [hopeful] The baby penguin snuggled closer, safe at last—but her parents were still missing.

speaker: RYDER
text: [steady] Alright, team. We’ve rescued the baby—but our mission isn’t over. We still need to reunite her with her family.

speaker: NARRATOR
text: [excited] And with that, the PAW Patrol—and their new Farsi-speaking friend—prepared for the next part of their chilly, exciting adventure…

speaker: NARRATOR
text: [teasing] To be continued in Chapter 2: Following the Footprints on the Ice!
